overview.serviceTitle: Professional UI/UX Design for Web & Mobile
overview.description: I design modern, responsive and user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile apps. I focus on usability and visual polish, delivering Figma/Adobe XD/PSD files, design systems, and developer-ready assets.

Basic.title: Basic UI Kit
Basic.description: A starter UI kit for small projects including 3 screens and basic components.

Advanced.title: Standard App Design
Advanced.description: Complete app design for up to 10 screens, interactive prototype, and style guide.

Premium.title: Premium End-to-End Design
Premium.description: Full product design with up to 30 screens, design system, and handoff-ready assets.

questions.question: What is the primary goal of your product?
